name: Clara M. Voss
biography: An American author known for speculative fiction blending historical elements with futuristic themes. Graduate of Yale's creative writing program. Resides in Portland, Oregon.
key_facts: Won the 2022 Nebula Award for Best Novel
Created the 'Fictional Futures' writing workshop series

name: Samuel T. Haddad
biography: British-Jordanian writer specializing in post-colonial cyberpunk narratives. Holds a PhD in Comparative Literature from Oxford. Based in Dubai.
key_facts: Recipient of the Arthur C. Clarke Innovation Award
Founder of the Arab Speculative Fiction Collective
Regular contributor to WIRED Middle East

name: Lila R. Cho
biography: Korean-Canadian author of climate fiction thrillers. Former environmental scientist turned full-time writer. Based in Vancouver.
key_facts: Developed the 'Climate Fiction Challenge' educational program
Consultant for UNEP's creative communications division
